item.title: DotCIO to Host Retirement Party for Jeff Miner July 12
item.description: From 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM on Friday, July 12 in the Heffner Alumni House Great Hall, all members of the campus community are welcome to join DotCIO in extending their best wishes to Jeff Miner, who is retiring after his many years of dedicated service here at Rensselaer. Please be sure to RSVP by Wednesday, July 3.
item.author: Community

item.title: NORDTECH Workforce Development Summit to be Held July 18
item.description: Date: Thursday, July 18, 2024 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM - The Northeast Regional Defense Technology Hub (NORDTECH) is organizing a day-long Workforce Development for Chips and Semiconductors Summit that will be held on Rensselaer’s Troy campus. The day will feature a keynote speech, a panel discussion, presentations from leading institutions and NORDTECH partners, breakout sessions, and a poster session. Register today to save your place!

item.title: GS Precision Info Session Part of CCPD Virtual Summer Series
item.description:
Please join the team at GS Precision from 6:30PM to 7:30PM on Thursday, July 11 to learn about career paths and company culture within the organization, as well as upcoming opportunities for Arch students seeking an Away experience. Also be sure to check out GS Precision’s Engineer Internship and Engineering Lean and Continuous Improvement Co-Op opportunities!
